overview: "Blok" begins and ends with the dreams of Iva and Viktor, and their story is proof of the well-known fact - when someone feels a really strong feeling, there are no boundaries for him. "I don't imagine the 'block' in physical and social terms, but as a metaphor of a boxing community that has lost its way," adds Matsanov. - The characters are very different, as the inhabitants of a 20-story Sofia block really are...
title: Блок (The Block 2022)
